Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product in the cafeteria's menu.

description.description: A brief description of the product.

price.description: The price of the product. Can be 0 for redeemable items.

category.description: The category the product belongs to.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation or search.

points.description: Points awarded to the user upon purchasing this product.

pointsCost.description: Points required to redeem this product.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a registered user of the application.

profilePicture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

points.description: The user's current loyalty points balance.

role.description: The user's role, which can grant special permissions.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who placed the order.

date.description: The date and time the order was placed.

items.description: List of items included in the order.

total.description: The total cost of the order.

totalPointsAwarded.description: Total points awarded for this order.

PointsHistoryEntry.title: Points History Entry
PointsHistoryEntry.description: Represents a single transaction in a user's points history.

amount.description: Positive for earnings, negative for spending.
